comments.body:
Please do not copy paste the file to create duplicate typings. 

You would want to follow something like what d3 typings do.
Please take a look at: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/d3/index.d.ts and the corresponding sub typings you can get eg. https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/d3-array/index.d.ts

This is what you need to do here as well.

Hi @sheetalkamat, thanks for taking a look! If you look at `lib/core.d.ts`, it is simply doing an `export * from 'plotly.js';`. The copied-and-pasted code is the test, which can be removed. The goal with this PR is to allow users to import from `plotly.js/lib/core` in addition to plain old `plotly.js` while still importing type declarations.
